context_of_use: This use case allows customers to search for products using keywords and filters to quickly locate items within the e-commerce platform.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to quickly locate specific items
description: This use case enables customers to search for products by keyword to facilitate quick item location.
triggering_event: Customer initiates a search for products.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the e-commerce system.
postconditions: Customer receives a list of products matching the search criteria.
assumptions: The customer has access to the internet and the e-commerce platform.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to search for products using keywords.
main_flow: 1. Customer enters a keyword into the search bar → System processes the search query.
2. System retrieves matching products from the database → System displays the list of products to the customer.
